Gradient Checkpointing

{% raw %}

class CheckpointingNotSupported[source]

CheckpointingNotSupported(msg='Model does not support gradient checkpointing.') :: Exception

Common base class for all non-exit exceptions.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class GradientCheckpointing[source]

GradientCheckpointing(after_create=None, before_fit=None, before_epoch=None, before_train=None, before_batch=None, after_pred=None, after_loss=None, before_backward=None, before_step=None, after_cancel_step=None, after_step=None, after_cancel_batch=None, after_batch=None, after_cancel_train=None, after_train=None, before_validate=None, after_cancel_validate=None, after_validate=None, after_cancel_epoch=None, after_epoch=None, after_cancel_fit=None, after_fit=None) :: Callback

A fastai callback to enable gradient checkpointing for compatible HuggingFace models.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
def clear_memory():
    torch.cuda.empty_cache()
    gc.collect()
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
def gpu_memory(device_idx=nvidia_smi_idx):
    return GPU.getGPUs()[device_idx].memoryUsed
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
path = untar_data(URLs.IMDB_SAMPLE)
model_path = Path("models")
imdb_df = pd.read_csv(path / "texts.csv")
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
learn = BlearnerForSequenceClassification.from_data(
    imdb_df, 
    "roberta-large", 
    dl_kwargs={"bs": 4}
)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
learn.fit_one_cycle(1, lr_max=1e-3)

base_mem = gpu_memory()
print(f"{base_mem} MBs used.")

# Clear gpu memory
clear_memory()
epoch train_loss valid_loss f1_score accuracy time
0 0.350596 0.233957 0.918033 0.925000 00:57 
9585.0 MBs used.
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
learn.fit_one_cycle(1, lr_max=1e-3, cbs=[GradientCheckpointing()])

check_mem = gpu_memory()
print(f"{check_mem} MBs used.")

test_eq(base_mem > check_mem, True)
epoch train_loss valid_loss f1_score accuracy time
0 0.207228 0.226048 0.918033 0.925000 01:21 
3017.0 MBs used.
{% endraw %}
